bonus.value: When Frost Resonance gets triggered: Every 3 seconds, deal frost damage equal to 60%/100%/150%/220% of frost ATK to enemies within a 10-meter radius and apply the Icefrost effect: Inflict 3.5% slow effect that lasts for 5 seconds, freeze targets for 3 seconds at 3 stacks (does not apply to bosses), and increase frost damage taken by the target by 5% for 18 seconds. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

Attack the target 10 times to inflict a 12-second Flashfreeze mark. Flashfreeze: Increase frost damage dealt to the marked target by 11%/28%/31%/34%. This Matrix's effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.

emotion.name: In Control
emotion.desc: An action that feels like everything is under control.
